name: Dimension Travelers
description:
Dimension Travelers: Get Much Higher As You Can

An arcade game which requires speed and reflexes. As you go higher, the levels will get harder and the speed of lava will increase. Make your moves as fast as you can.

Control for Windows and Web : W, A, S, D or  ↑, ←,  →, ↓

Control for Android: Swipe to the direction wherever you want to go.
